name: 魂斗羅リバース
summary: Contra ReBirth (魂斗羅リバース Kontora Ribāsu) is a 2D run and gun video game developed by M2 and published by Konami for WiiWare. It is the twelfth original installment in the Contra series. It was released in Japan on May 12, 2009, PAL regions on September 4, 2009, and North America on September 7, 2009.
